each mandible sew the mandibles on either side of the face the lower mandibles behind the mouth the upper mandibles behind the eyes insert the needle horizontally through the stitches above the unworked front loops of r 2 and then similarly into the stitches of the face and repeat around the base of each mandible sewing them to the face knot the yarn strands together when finished with each one and weave in the ends make sure to sew the mandibles with the elbows facing the right way the excess wire can be pushed into the stitches of the face before sewing this gives the mandibles stability make sure the placement of the mandibles match on both sides of the face ❖ arms sew the arms in the same way as the mandibles about 9 stitches apart under the belly on opposite sides with the picot on each end facing forward photos right -> 1 2
